Text: Red Access Card
Blue Access Card

Name: Stage Skip Notice
Text: This cutscene is still in production. Skipping to section 1-2.

Name: Work Log
Text: Today: Inspection of Art Exhibition AreaPerson in Charge: Big MackPosition: High-Voltage Supervisor

Name: Vera
Text: What the hell is this?

Name: Vera
Text: No survivors from the Engineering Department, nor any bodies, but I can't shake the feeling that something else is here.

Name: Vera
Text: The art exhibition area? I remember it should be on the left.

Name: Vera
Text: OK, that should do it.

Name: Commandant
Text: Vera, get out of there now! The dome is becoming unstable.

Name: Vera
Text: Copy that. Heading to the evacuation area.

Name: Vera
Text: [The action sequence for this part is still being edited]

Name: System
Text: No valid authorization detected

Name: System
Text: Valid authorization detected

Name: Vera
Text: Ha, what a warm welcome.

Name: Vera
Text: Tch, it's locked. Captain, do we have any breaching devices left?

Name: Captain
Text: No more! Maybe we can find <color=#FF0000>access cards</color> on the building staff, but that area is full of those monsters!

Name: Captain
Text: We've already lost some people, and communications are down... We might not even make it out of here ourselves.

Name: Vera
Text: Check for casualties first. It's not over yet.

Name: Captain
Text: Tsk, easy for you to say... Keep your eyes on that health signal detector and look for more survivors.

Name: Vera
Text: Impressive. You've completely reversed the labels for "fatal" and "non-fatal" wounds. Did they teach you to make such elementary errors at the academy?

Name: Vera
Text: Forget it, I'll handle the search mission. You stay here and catch your breath—just try not to die of fright if you see an enemy.

Name: Captain
Text: Still with that damn attitude... You better not come back empty-handed!

Name: Vera
Text: Hm? Here's an access card... Heading back to the gate now.

Name: Vera
Text: Huh? Am I hallucinating...? Something's been off from the very beginning...

Name: Status
Text: Death

Name: Status
Text: <color=#FF0000>Fatal Wound</color>

Name: Status
Text: <color=#FF0000>Non-Fatal Wound</color>

Name: Status
Text: Healthy

Name: Team Member
Text: There's a voice, Vera!

Name: Team Member
Text: Those things are coming after us! Watch your back!

Name: Vera
Text: —! There's another survivor!

Name: Vera
Text: They just keep coming! Get lost!!

Name: Status
Text: Fatal Wound

Name: Status
Text: Non-Fatal Wound

Name: Vera
Text: What, the defense line has been breached already...?!

Name: Vera
Text: ...Where am I? Wasn't I just inside the building?

Name: Vera
Text: Vera to Squad Three, I repeat—

Name: Vera
Text: ...! There are bodies.

Name: Vera
Text: Why is everything made of metal? Is the detection device malfunctioning?

Name: Control Center
Text: Authorization expired, restarting baseline test program.

Name: Vera
Text: ...Where is that voice coming from now?

Name: Control Center
Text: Preliminary assessment indicates "Hound" is in good condition. Permission granted to begin baseline testing.

Name: Control Center
Text: "I was the shadow of the waxwing slain, by the false azure in the window pane."

Name: Control Center
Text: "I am ready to charge to the frontlines at any moment, and may be killed by the Corrupted at any time, but I am not afraid of this fate."

Name: Control Center
Text: "On the Punishing battlefield, sometimes you must kill comrades infected by Punishing with your own hands. You approve of this practice."

Name: Control Center
Text: “在经历各种战场之后，你认为自己产生了心理阴影，或更重的意识海偏移症状。”

Name: Control Center
Text: "While fighting for Kurono, you felt that everything might be fake."

Name: Control Center
Text: "Your existence might also be fake."

Name: Control Center
Text: "You harbor resentment toward the world and everything around you. You decide to shatter the window."

Name: Control Center
Text: Test passed. Authorization granted. Initiating memory data synchronization.

Name: Control Center
Text: Test failed. Terminating authorization... %*[.&*（/~*@#... Initiating memory data synchronization.

Name: Vera
Text: ...I see, so this frame is active again.

Name: Vera
Text: Come, take a piece of flesh from the body of mine<//DISASTER>.

Name: Medic Bot
Text: Error. Unable to identify healing target.

Name: Vera's Classmate
Text: Thank you...

Name: Vera's Classmate
Text: Thank you, Vera, though the wound still hurts a bit... Ouch!

Name: Vera
Text: Vera to Squad Three. Do you copy?
<color=#e8f5ff>Rolling Snow</color>
红潮值
红潮值

Name: 万事
Text: Identify the boss's shield color and choose matching Signal Orbs to break it.

Name: 万事
Text: Identify the boss's shield color and choose matching Signal Orbs to break it or avoid it by moving to the right position.

Name: 万事
Text: Identify the boss's shield color and choose matching Signal Orbs to break it.

Name: 万事
Text: Identify the boss's shield color and choose matching Signal Orbs to break it or avoid it by moving to the right position.

Name: Wanshi
Text: Shorthalt has entered the <color=#FF0000>Berserk Phase</color>. Watch out.

Name: Host
Text: Good evening, everyone, and welcome to the never-ending Mechanical Arena! Get ready for a jaw-dropping, sparks-flying, steel-on-steel spectacle!

Name: Spectator A
Text: Yeah! Kill it—tear it apart—!

Name: Spectator B
Text: We want blood! More blood!

Name: Host
Text: In tonight's main event, Veronica goes head-to-head with the mighty "Crusher Pincers"! What tricks does she have up her sleeve, folks? Let's find out!

Name: Veronica
Text: Not even worth bothering with.

Name: Veronica
Text: Nothing but brute force. What a waste of time.

Name: Veronica
Text: Give up! It's no use!

Name: Host
Text: What an unbelievable turn of events! "Crusher Pincers" just launched a counterattack on Veronica! This battle is getting more and more intense!

Name: Host
Text: Let's see which side lands that heart-stopping finishing blow!

Name: Spectator A
Text: Hahaha! What a thrill! Absolutely exhilarating!

Name: Spectator B
Text: Finish it! Run that pathetic loser through—skewer it!

Name: System
Text: Multiple frame damages detected. Maintenance request automatically submitted.

Name: Veronica
Text: Hum...

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Can you hurry it up? The monitoring system is scheduled for maintenance tonight. Let's get this done before then! I'm trying to clock out on time.

Name: Serra
Text: Ah, sorry! Just a few more mechanoid modules to upgrade. I just need to make some adjustments at the terminal.

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Fine, fine, I've given you full access. I'm out of here—just make it quick!

Name: Serra
Text: Phew, finally alone. Let me see... the "Match Schedule" system access should be... Got it!

Name: Serra
Text: Status switching... input confirmed, done! Now all of Veronica's systems have been set to "Awaiting Maintenance."

Name: Serra
Text: Veronica, I've got everything squared away for our "special plan."

Name: Serra
Text: Don't sweat it, everything's going to be fine. Besides... we've got some "friends" helping us out.

Name: Serra
Text: Alright, let's cut off communications here. I'm getting a little antsy about all these "sensitive terms"—don't want to tip anyone off...

Name: Veronica
Text: Got it.

Name: Veronica
Text: Do you truly believe who you are now is your "real" self?

Name: Serra
Text: Alright, system maintenance is almost wrapped up... now's our window!

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Ugh, another system maintenance? Seriously, it kept me working overtime this late! At least I can finally clock out.

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Who's there?!

Name: Serra
Text: C-crap, why is someone still here?

Name: Serra
Text: Shoot, nowhere to hide... I gotta jump...

Name: Veronica
Text: Are you trying to get yourself killed?!

Name: Serra
Text: L-let me go. You scared the living daylights out of me! Thank goodness it's just you.

Name: Serra
Text: Quick, put me down! Someone's coming!

Name: Staff Member A
Text: I must be seeing things... Definitely working too much overtime.

Name: Serra
Text: Perfect! Now's our chance! The surveillance system is going into maintenance mode. No one will spot us now.

Name: Veronica
Text: Stick close to me.

Name: Serra
Text: Something's not right... Why have my access permissions been revoked?

Name: Staff Member B
Text: Don't even bother! What, did you really think your little tricks would fly here? Target acquired! Get them!

Name: Guard Mechanoid
Text: Command confirmed. Target locked. Initiating combat protocol.

Name: Veronica
Text: Fools who don't know their place. Anyone in my path will be eliminated.

Name: Veronica
Text: You bastards... You're not... getting away...

Name: Staff Member B
Text: Well, would you look at that. This mechanoid actually put up more of a fight than I figured.

Name: Serra
Text: Veronica... Let me go! VERONICA!

Name: Security Guard A
Text: Well, well, if it isn't our new rising star?

Name: Security Guard B
Text: Hey! Light repair gear is in the general section.

Name: Security Guard B
Text: This isn't where you should be.

Name: Security Guard C
Text: Nothing to see here. Move along.

Name: Unremarkable Repairer
Text: Are you the new gladiator? The way you fought just now was really impressive.

Name: Unremarkable Repairer
Text: But strength means nothing here. We're all just "tools" for human amusement.

Name: Unremarkable Repairer
Text: Forget it, I'm rambling. The auto-repair unit's right across from here. Go patch up your frame.

Name: Unremarkable Repairer
Text: Good luck.

Name: Unremarkable Repairer
Text: Oh, right, I didn't tell you my name. I'm Hawked-V, a new fighter here just like you.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: If you don't mind, would you spar with me before the match? Honestly, gladiator fights have always scared me.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: Alright, I'll do my best.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: I knew I wasn't wrong about you. You're really strong. If we end up fighting in the arena, it'll be a great match—even if I lose.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: Anyway, thanks. You've lit my fighting spirit again. I'll keep pushing myself from now on.

Name: Hawked-V
Text: That's a shame, but I guess it's just because I'm too weak.

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Who are you betting on next round?

Name: Staff Member B
Text: I'm putting 300,000 on Veronica to win!

Name: Staff Member A
Text: Nice! You've got guts!

Name: Noisy Mechanoid
Text: Lights on, game on.

Name: Noisy Mechanoid
Text: It's past three. Time to top up my oil.

Name: Noisy Mechanoid
Text: You don't actually think outside is better, do you? It's obviously nicer here.
